name: Constellation Runner (Google Cardboard)
description:
Surf the intergalactic highway, while dodging spaceships and collecting power-ups. Constellation Runner is an addicting endless runner game for Google Cardboard.

HIGHLIGHTS:
- Full game and high score tracking system
- Simple controls
- Increasing difficulty over time
- Power-ups with unique benefits like slowing traffic, turning obstacles into more power-ups and more
- Dark color scheme and environment to minimize eye strain
- Responsive UI and in-game objects
- Detailed written tutorial with illustrations
- No ads or in-app purchases
- No registration, account or links to social media needed
- No push notifications

HOW TO PLAY:
- Dodge incoming spaceships for as long as possible while trying to gain points.
- Move from lane to lane by gazing at your desired location and pressing the cardboard trigger.
- Collect multi-colored star power-ups that increase your score and give you special abilities.

POWER-UPS:
Yellow Star: +1 points, no additional powers
Blue Star: +1 points, slows down spaceships for 10 seconds
Purple Star: +1 points, allows you to select a spaceship obstacle to turn into an additional power-up
Pink Star: +1 points, spawns 3 extra power-ups over the next 20 seconds
